name: Glide Women's Center
description: The GLIDE WOMEN'S CENTER provides a safe haven for women on the road to recovery from trauma, violence, and isolation. They offer a safe and supportive community that empowers survivors of all types of trauma to heal and thrive. If you are a woman who has slipped through the social safety net, is living on the street or in an unstable housing situation, or need social support, we’re here for you. - Weekday Drop-In Groups: Group discussions cover a variety of topics every morning and afternoon.
